NAME: Find the lost treasure of the Toltecs!
AUTHOR: md5

BODY.p: After saving an old peddler from a band of bandits, Fenimore Fillmore finds about three skulls that will unlock the lost treasure of the Toltecs! It's up to him to find the golden skulls and the treasure, before the bandits do!

The ScummVM Team is pleased to announce support for 3 Skulls of the Toltecs. So grab your copies of the DOS versions of the game and start playing in the latest daily build of ScummVM and help us with the testing, while enjoying this great cartoon western adventure game!
